extendedInfo.description: By name list of saved locations for use with google maps and/or your navigation software.  Uses coordinates Lat/Lon to save locations as opposed to street addresses.  Clicking a saved location from the list places a tag on map for Location selected.  Tapping on the NAV arrow in upper left enters the destination directly into your navigation app for turn by turn directions.Features:-save Locations by name-find Lat and Long GPS coordinates by long pressing on map-load saved locations directly into nav app-compose text message containing saved location data-generate google maps link in new sms messageFuture features in beta: (will update when ready)-cloud backup-saved location grouping (work,personnel,etc...)
